byISBN.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpprop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX ontology: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
select ?s_isbn ?s_title ?s_synopsis ?s_language ?s_genre ?s_country ?s_author
where {
?book rdf:type ontology:Book.
?book dbpprop:isbn ?s_isbn. FILTER regex(?s_isbn, "{{BY0}}"). FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_isbn ), "en" ) ).
?book dbpprop:genre ?_genre. OPTIONAL{?_genre rdfs:label ?s_genre. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_genre ), "en" ) )}.
OPTIONAL{?book dbpprop:name ?s_title. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_title ), "en" ) )}.
OPTIONAL{?book ontology:abstract ?s_synopsis. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_synopsis ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:language ?_language. OPTIONAL{?_language  dbpprop:iso ?s_language. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_language ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:country ?_country. OPTIONAL{?_country dbpprop:countryCode ?s_country. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_country ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:author ?_author. OPTIONAL{?_author dbpprop:name ?s_author. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_author ), "en" ) )}.
}

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpprop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX ontology: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
select ?s_isbn ?s_title ?s_synopsis ?s_language ?s_genre ?s_country ?s_author
where {
?book rdf:type ontology:Book.
?book dbpprop:isbn ?s_isbn. FILTER regex(?s_isbn, "{{BY0}}"). FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_isbn ), "en" ) ).
?book dbpprop:genre ?_genre. OPTIONAL{?_genre rdfs:label ?s_genre. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_genre ), "en" ) )}.
OPTIONAL{?book dbpprop:name ?s_title. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_title ), "en" ) )}.
OPTIONAL{?book ontology:abstract ?s_synopsis. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_synopsis ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:language ?_language. OPTIONAL{?_language  dbpprop:iso ?s_language. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_language ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:country ?_country. OPTIONAL{?_country dbpprop:countryCode ?s_country. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_country ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:author ?_author. OPTIONAL{?_author dbpprop:name ?s_author. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_author ), "en" ) )}.
}

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpprop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX ontology: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>

where {
?book rdf:type ontology:Book.
?book dbpprop:isbn ?s_isbn. FILTER regex(?s_isbn, "{{BY0}}"). FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_isbn ), "en" ) ).
?book dbpprop:genre ?_genre. OPTIONAL{?_genre rdfs:label ?s_genre. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_genre ), "en" ) )}.
OPTIONAL{?book dbpprop:name ?s_title. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_title ), "en" ) )}.

?book dbpprop:language ?_language. OPTIONAL{?_language  dbpprop:iso ?s_language. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_language ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:country ?_country. OPTIONAL{?_country dbpprop:countryCode ?s_country. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_country ), "en" ) )}.

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpprop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX ontology: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
select ?s_isbn ?s_title ?s_synopsis ?s_language ?s_genre ?s_country ?s_author
where {
?book rdf:type ontology:Book.
?book dbpprop:isbn ?s_isbn. FILTER regex(?s_isbn, "{{BY0}}"). FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_isbn ), "en" ) ).
?book dbpprop:genre ?_genre. OPTIONAL{?_genre rdfs:label ?s_genre. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_genre ), "en" ) )}.
OPTIONAL{?book dbpprop:name ?s_title. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_title ), "en" ) )}.
OPTIONAL{?book ontology:abstract ?s_synopsis. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_synopsis ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:language ?_language. OPTIONAL{?_language  dbpprop:iso ?s_language. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_language ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:country ?_country. OPTIONAL{?_country dbpprop:countryCode ?s_country. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_country ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:author ?_author. OPTIONAL{?_author dbpprop:name ?s_author. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_author ), "en" ) )}.
}

byAuthor.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpprop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX ontology: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
select ?s_isbn ?s_title ?s_synopsis ?s_language ?s_genre ?s_country ?s_author
where {
?book rdf:type ontology:Book.
?book dbpprop:isbn ?s_isbn. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_isbn ), "en" ) ).
?book dbpprop:genre ?_genre. OPTIONAL{?_genre rdfs:label ?s_genre. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_genre ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:name ?s_title. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_title ), "en" ) ).
OPTIONAL{?book ontology:abstract ?s_synopsis. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_synopsis ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:language ?_language. OPTIONAL{?_language  dbpprop:iso ?s_language. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_language ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:country ?_country. OPTIONAL{?_country dbpprop:countryCode ?s_country. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_country ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:author ?_author. ?_author dbpprop:name ?s_author. FILTER regex( ?s_author, "{{BY0}}", "i"). FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_author ), "en" ) ).
}

byGenre.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpprop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX ontology: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
select ?s_isbn ?s_title ?s_synopsis ?s_language ?s_genre ?s_country ?s_author
where {
?book rdf:type ontology:Book.
?book dbpprop:isbn ?s_isbn. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_isbn ), "en" ) ).
?book dbpprop:genre ?_genre. ?_genre rdfs:label ?s_genre. FILTER regex( ?s_genre, "{{BY0}}", "i").FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_genre ), "en" ) ).
?book dbpprop:name ?s_title. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_title ), "en" ) ).
OPTIONAL{?book ontology:abstract ?s_synopsis. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_synopsis ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:language ?_language. OPTIONAL{?_language  dbpprop:iso ?s_language. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_language ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:country ?_country. OPTIONAL{?_country dbpprop:countryCode ?s_country. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_country ), "en" ) )}.
?book dbpprop:author ?_author. OPTIONAL{?_author dbpprop:name ?s_author. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_author ), "en" ) ).}
}

seriesNext.query:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbpprop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
PREFIX ontology: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
select ?s_isbn ?s_title ?s_synopsis ?s_language ?s_genre ?s_country ?s_author
where {
 ?nbook rdf:type ontology:Book.
 ?book rdf:type ontology:Book.
 ?nbook dbpprop:isbn ?ns_isbn. FILTER regex( ?ns_isbn, "{{BY0}}", "i"). FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?ns_isbn ), "en" ) ).
 ?nbook dbpprop:followedBy ?book.
 ?book dbpprop:isbn ?s_isbn. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_isbn ), "en" ) ).
 ?book dbpprop:genre ?_genre. OPTIONAL{?_genre rdfs:label ?s_genre. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_genre ), "en" ) )}.
 ?book dbpprop:name ?s_title. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_title ), "en" ) ).
 OPTIONAL{?book ontology:abstract ?s_synopsis. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_synopsis ), "en" ) )}.
 ?book dbpprop:language ?_language. OPTIONAL{?_language  dbpprop:iso ?s_language. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_language ), "en" ) )}.
 ?book dbpprop:country ?_country. OPTIONAL{?_country dbpprop:countryCode ?s_country. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_country ), "en" ) )}.
 ?book dbpprop:author ?_author. ?_author dbpprop:name ?s_author. FILTER( langMatches( lang( ?s_author ), "en" ) ).
}
